N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 40-2.51 - Environmental radiation protection; performance standards

State Regulations

The local health department shall maintain a program to conduct environmental radiation surveillance activities, if the Department has authorized the local health department to conduct such a program. Such program shall, at a minimum, maintain appropriate equipment and supplies, ensure that personnel are properly trained, and collect environmental samples for radiological analysis. Notes
